## Submission Checklist

Before submitting, please ensure:

- [ ] I have achieved DSS certification at the level claimed above
- [ ] All links are publicly accessible
- [ ] The certification report is complete and accurate
- [ ] The repository contains all required evidence
- [ ] The strategy code is publicly available
- [ ] All claims can be verified by maintainers
- [ ] I have read the [Registry Guidelines](../../REGISTRY.md#submission-requirements)
